channel.title: 🏢 the Chinese University of Hong Kong on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 the Chinese University of Hong Kong on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: X$^{2}$-Gaussian: 4D Radiative Gaussian Splatting for Continuous-time Tomographic Reconstruction
item.description: X2-Gaussian enables continuous-time 4D CT reconstruction via dynamic radiative Gaussian splatting and self-supervised respiratory motion learning.

item.title: Long Context Tuning for Video Generation
item.description: LCT: Fine-tunes single-shot video diffusion models for coherent multi-shot video generation without extra parameters!
